content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient, considering its location and amenities. How much were you thinking of offering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. Considering that the apartment is unfurnished and has an area of 50 square meters, I was thinking of starting at 500 Euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: 500 Euros per month is an interesting offer, Maryam. However, I must consider that the apartment is in the city center, which is a prime location. It's also newly built, which adds to its appeal. Would you be willing to increase your offer to reflect these factors?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your consideration, Mister Schmidt. Considering the location and condition of the apartment, I am willing to increase my offer to 550 Euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: 550 Euros per month is a step in the right direction, Maryam. However, I'm looking for a rent that truly reflects the value of this apartment. It's not just the location and condition; it's also the proximity to essential facilities. Would you be willing to go a bit higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your explanation, Mister Schmidt. Considering the proximity to essential facilities, I am willing to increase my offer to 600 Euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: 600 Euros per month is closer to what I had in mind, Maryam. However, I'm still not convinced it fully captures the premium value of this apartment. It's a rare find in the city center, and I'm sure you'll appreciate the convenience it offers. Would you consider making one final increase?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your patience, Mister Schmidt. Considering the rarity of the apartment, I am willing to increase my offer to 650 Euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: 650 Euros per month is an offer I can seriously consider, Maryam. It's clear you value the convenience and quality of the apartment. Let me think about it for a moment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. Please take your time to consider my offer. I look forward to your response.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: After careful consideration, Maryam, I believe 650 Euros per month is a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment. I agree to the price of 650 Euros!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [650] Euro!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
